mapper.select: SELECT u.username, u.name, c.content AS position_content , u.parent, d.text FROM user u JOIN department d ON u.parent = d.id JOIN code c ON u.position = c.name WHERE u.username = #{userId}

choose.when: SELECT r.no, r.username, u.name, 'room' AS category, r.room_name AS subject, NULL AS type, NULL AS model_name, r.count, r.content, r.create_date, r.updater, r.update_date, r.is_room AS is_active, r.use_yn FROM room r JOIN user u ON r.username = u.username WHERE r.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY r.create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

SELECT i.no, i.username, u.name, 'item' AS category, i.item_name AS subject, i.type, i.model_name, NULL AS count, i.content, i.create_date, i.updater, i.update_date, i.is_item AS is_active, i.use_yn FROM item i JOIN user u ON i.username = u.username WHERE i.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY i.create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
choose.otherwise: SELECT r.no, r.username, u.name, 'room' AS category, r.room_name AS subject, NULL AS type, NULL AS model_name, r.count, r.content, r.create_date, r.updater, r.update_date, r.is_room AS is_active, r.use_yn FROM room r JOIN user u ON r.username = u.username WHERE r.use_yn = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT i.no, i.username, u.name, 'item' AS category, i.item_name AS subject, i.type, i.model_name, NULL AS count, i.content, i.create_date, i.updater, i.update_date, i.is_item AS is_active, i.use_yn FROM item i JOIN user u ON i.username = u.username WHERE i.use_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY create_date DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}

mapper.select: SELECT i.no, i.username, u.name, i.item_name, i.type, i.model_name, i.content, i.create_date, i.updater, i.update_date, i.is_item, i.use_yn, i.selection FROM item i JOIN `user` u ON i.username = u.username WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE item SET updater = #{username}, type = #{type}, item_name = #{item_name}, model_name = #{model_name}, content = #{content}, is_item = #{is_item}, selection = #{selection} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.select: SELECT r.no, r.username, u.name, r.room_name, r.count, r.content, r.create_date, r.updater, r.update_date, r.is_room, r.use_yn FROM room r JOIN `user` u ON r.username = u.username WHERE no=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE room SET updater = #{username}, room_name = #{room_name}, count = #{count}, content = #{content}, is_room = #{is_room} WHERE no = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO item_schedule(no, username, start_date, end_date, subject, content) VALUES(#{no},#{username},#{start_date},#{end_date},#{subject},#{content})
mapper.select: SELECT s.idx, s.no, s.username, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.subject, s.content, s.create_date, i.item_name, i.selection, u.name FROM item_schedule s JOIN item i ON s.no = i.no JOIN user u ON s.username = u.username WHERE idx=#{idx}
mapper.update: UPDATE item_schedule SET start_date = #{calenderDto.start_date}, end_date = #{calenderDto.end_date}, subject = #{calenderDto.subject}, content = #{calenderDto.content}, updater = #{calenderDto.username}, no = #{calenderDto.no} WHERE idx = #{idx}
